hero.title: DiagZone Pro: Software Solutions for Vehicle Diagnostics
hero.subtitle: We offer software licenses for diagnostic scanners. Discover our compatible devices and check your serial number.

features.title: Professional-Grade Capabilities
features.subtitle: Access a suite of cutting-edge tools for vehicle diagnosis and maintenance.
features.feature1_desc: Includes ADAS system calibration, IMMO programming, TPMS, and much more.
features.feature2_desc: Ability to read and clear fault codes from all vehicle modules.
features.feature3_desc: Complete freedom of movement with a cable-free connection to your tablet or phone.
features.feature4_desc: Monitor vehicle sensors and parameters in real-time for accurate analysis.

compatibility.title: EXTENSIVE VEHICLE COVERAGE
compatibility.main_text: Our platform supports a vast selection of scanners and VCIs on the market. We cover <1>12-Volt</1> vehicles, <1>24-Volt (HD)</1> heavy-duty trucks and machinery, and even the latest <1>Electric (EV)</1> cars.
compatibility.secondary_text: Additionally, the software enables over <1>42 maintenance functions</1>, <1>ADAS</1> system calibrations, <1>IMMO</1> key programming, and <1>TPMS PROG</1> service.

downloads_page.title: Download Center
downloads_page.subtitle: Access the links to download the most recent versions of our applications.

connectors_page.title: Full Scanner Catalog
connectors_page.subtitle: Browse our entire selection of compatible diagnostic devices.

footer.description: A comprehensive solution for vehicle diagnostics, offering coverage for over 240 brands worldwide.
footer.copyright: Â© 2024 DiagZone Pro. All rights reserved.

idiag-for-android.name: iDiag for Android
idiag-for-android.description: Diagnostic adapter designed for Android systems.

hd-iv.name: HD IV
hd-iv.description: VCI for diagnosing trucks and heavy machinery.

m-diag.name: M-Diag
m-diag.description: A diagnostic tool designed for mobility.

pro4-d3.name: PRO4 D3
pro4-d3.description: A scanner built for intensive professional use.
